longBusinessSummary: Brookfield Business Corporation engages in the renewable power and transition, infrastructure, private equity, real estate, credit, and insurance solutions in the United States, Australia, Brazil, Europe, the United Kingdom, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Business Services, Infrastructure Services, and Industrials. The company operates 39 hospitals; offers construction services for landmark buildings and social infrastructure; provides nuclear technology services to the nuclear power generation industry; and offers cloud-based software as a service solutions to dealerships and original equipment manufacturers in automotive and related industries. It is also involved in the provision of sanitation service, which include collection, treatment, and distribution of water and wastewater to the residential and governmental customers. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in New York, New York.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Denis Andre Turcotte M.B.A., MBA, P.Eng.
companyOfficers.title: Managing Partner of Private Equity - Brookfield Asset Management Inc.
